The PCI ID used in this entry is from that device. :The '''[[Dell]]''' P/N seems to be 07KGX9. ==Notes== ===pci ids=== 008a Centrino Wireless-N 1030 [Rainbow Peak] 8086 5305 Centrino Wireless-N 1030 BGN 8086 5307 Centrino Wireless-N 1030 BG 8086 5325 Centrino Wireless-N 1030 BGN 8086 5327 Centrino Wireless-N 1030 BG 008b Centrino Wireless-N 1030 [Rainbow Peak] 8086 5315 Centrino Wireless-N 1030 BGN 8086 5317 Centrino Wireless-N 1030 BG ===Variants=== 11230BNHMW (supports 802.11b/g/n) 11230BGHRU (supports 802.11b/g) [[Category:English Documentation]]
